description: Source code for authentication-related API route handlers in an Express.js application, including registration, login, and fetching current user info.

methods.name: router.post('/register')
methods.description: Handles user registration by validating input, calling registerUser, and returning user info with token.

methods.name: router.post('/login')
methods.description: Handles user login by validating input, calling loginUser, and returning user info with token.

methods.name: router.get('/me')
methods.description: Returns current authenticated user's info, requiring authentication middleware.
